member.name: PenAlignment
member.summary: The PenAlignment enumeration specifies the alignment of a pen relative to the stroke that is being drawn.

member.name: PenAlignment.PenAlignmentCenter
member.summary: Specifies that the pen is aligned on the center of the line that is drawn.

member.name: PenAlignment.PenAlignmentInset
member.summary: Specifies, when drawing a polygon, that the pen is aligned on the inside of the edge of the polygon.
